definition: to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof

sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Higher Diploma in Human Resource Management, Tsing Yi Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升讀青衣分校人力資源管理學高級文憑課程二年級。
他驕傲地誇示他的畢業文憑。

sentences.english: Welcome to the Hong Kong Diploma of Secondary Education (HKDSE) Examination Online Services.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎使用香港中學文憑考試網上服務。

sentences.english: Nolan has reservations about the new diplomas.
sentences.chinese: 諾蘭對新的文憑持保留態度。

sentences.english: A college diploma may be required for some positions in this group.
sentences.chinese: 本組的某些職位需要取得大學文憑。

sentences.english: Secondary Education or government recognized certificate in Metal Machining.
sentences.chinese: 高中教育水平或政府承認的金屬機加工文憑。

sentences.english: Applicants presenting International Baccalaureate diplomas are eligible for general admission to the University.
sentences.chinese: 申請人提交國際文憑文憑一般大學入學資格。

sentences.english: Applicants presenting International Baccalaureate diplomas are eligible for general admission to the University.
sentences.chinese: 申請人提交國際文憑文憑一般大學入學資格。

sentences.english: Gone are the days when a diploma determines your life-time fate.
sentences.chinese: 一紙文憑定終身的時代一去不返。

sentences.english: I could not really stand that. I really wanted to obtain my VWO diploma.
sentences.chinese: 對此我幾乎不能忍受，我真的很想拿到VWO文憑。

sentences.english: I have a College Diploma in Medical Administration and am a Certified TESOL holder.
sentences.chinese: 教齡我有一個醫院管理大學文憑及TESOL認證。

sentences.english: When are you going to acquire the master degree?
sentences.chinese: 你打算什麼時候拿到碩士文憑。

sentences.english: From this vantage point, a diploma starts to look a lot like a receipt printed on fine cardstock.
sentences.chinese: 從這一點來看，文憑不過是一張製作精良的收據。

sentences.english: SWP Higher Diploma in Business is an international accredited course.
sentences.chinese: SWP工商管理高級文憑課程被受國際認可。

sentences.english: The duration of studies leading to higher level diplomas depends on the type of faculty.
sentences.chinese: 較高水平的文憑學習年限由專業類型來決定。

sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Diploma in Electrical Engineering, Haking Wong Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升讀黃克競分校電機工程文憑課程二年級。
